description: Foundation border radius tokens - Semantic border radius values that reference primitive radius tokens. Maintains consistency of rounded corners across the interface.

0.usage: No rounding - sharp corners for strict, formal elements

4.usage: Subtle rounding - minimal softness for small elements

8.usage: Small rounding - badges, tags, small buttons

12.usage: Medium rounding - buttons, inputs, small cards

16.usage: Base rounding - standard cards, modals, panels

24.usage: Extra large rounding - hero sections, large containers

circular.usage: Circular shape - avatars, icon buttons, badges, pills
